name: Minecraft: Nether Update
description: Ambient and atmospheric tracks capturing the eerie essence of the Nether dimension.

downloads.overrideDescription:
§6The Nether Update soundtrack features a collection of ambient and atmospheric music tracks composed by Lena Raine, capturing the eerie and mysterious essence of the Nether dimension in Minecraft.
§2§o1st disc out of 3.
